name: Hawked
summary:
Hawked is an online PvPvE extraction shooter coming soon to consoles and PC.
Squad up to explore a mysterious island, battle monsters, outwit enemy players to steal ancient treasures, and get the hell outta there!

The primary mode in the game is The Hunt, with players arriving on a mysterious island and competing for priceless treasures called Artifacts – while fighting monsters, avoiding traps, solving puzzles, and engaging in PvP versus rival players. The treasures players collect and successfully extract are used outside of the session to make the player's character stronger and unlock new abilities and perks.
